title: (1) Off street parking requirement - For Redevelopment Projects in Thane Municipal Corporation area, multiplying factor for off street parking requirement as per Regulation No
clause_text: (1) Off street parking requirement - For Redevelopment Projects in Thane Municipal Corporation area, multiplying factor for off street parking requirement as per Regulation No.8.2.2 shall be 0.8.
section: (1) Height of Building Permissible for Re-development Proposals / SRA Proposals
